issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Create utility for printing record batches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8264](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8264). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is too difficult to write examples that print record batches and it would be good to have a utility method to print a batch or to get rows from a batch as a Vec<String>. We already have code in the CSV writer that could be repurposed.

Another option is to modify the csv writer to be able to print to a string rather than a file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8264?focusedCommentId=17071423) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6754
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6754>
